body.p: The endnote texts are always reproduced at the place where they actually stand. They are tagged with the <note> element, which contains the @place (value: end) and @n (value: the endnote reference in the text) attributes as well as a @xml:id and a reference to the corresponding endnote character by means of @prev:
body.codeblock: <note place="end" n="[endnote reference]" xml:id="[ID 02]" prev="#[ID 01]">[endnote text]</note>
body.p: Formatting, column and line breaks in the endnote text are handled as in the main text.
If an endnote contains a footnote, it will be tagged in accordance with the footnote guidelines.

fig.codeblock: <note place="end" n="78)" xml:id="a02" prev="#a01"> Vergl. Autenrieth über das Gift der Fische, Tübingen 1833, wo die früheren<lb/> Nachrichten zusammengestellt und beurtheilt sind. </note><lb/>

p.i: Source: Martens, Eduard von: Die preussische Expedition nach Ost-Asien. Nach amtlichen Quellen. Zoologischer Teil. Erster Band. Berlin, 1876. [Facsimile 377]
